pageContent: Purpose: Men with castration-resistant prostate cancer (CRPC) experience disease progression at different rates. The purpose of this study was to quantify the strength of patient preferences for delaying prostate cancer progression utilizing a discrete choice experiment (DCE) and valuing 3 health states in the continuum of CRPC.

metaData.source:
[Nerve-sparing radical retropubic prostatectomy. Results of a patient survey]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11315583/
